H0.text: Who did Germany defeat to win the 1990 FIFA World Cup. Brazil

A4.text: The final between West Germany and Argentina has been cited as one of two most cynical and lowest-quality of all World Cup Finals, next to the 2010, between Spain and Netherlands.

A5.text: West Germany defeated Argentina in the 1990 FIFA World Cup final.
